      Methods in org.simpleyaml.configuration that return ConfigurationOptions 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ConfigurationOptions ConfigurationOptions.copyDefaults​(boolean value)
      Sets if the Configuration should copy values from its default Configuration directly.
      ConfigurationOptions Configuration.options()
      Gets the ConfigurationOptions for this Configuration.
      ConfigurationOptions ConfigurationOptions.pathSeparator​(char value)
      Sets the char that will be used to separate ConfigurationSections
